name: Uniwhale
introduce: Uniwhale is an oracle-based decentralized on-chain perpetual trading exchange where users can trade, with up to 200x leverage, BTC, ETH, and many mainstream crypto assets, directly from wallet. Based on objective price oracles and single-sided liquidity, Uniwhale aims to deliver the best trading experience for traders with zero credit risk and minimize impermanent loss for liquidity providers.
